LanguageData.RC2_SoldierPill.label: Soldier Pill
LanguageData.RC2_SoldierPill.description: These potent brown 'pills' are made from a combination of high-energy food stuffs and various chemicals. They provide the user with long-term energy and decreased hunger, although after their effects wear off, the user becomes exhausted and hungry. Their best use is for soldiers in the field - but be warn of a dependance on them that can cause stomach conditions.
